remarks: Ordering property for complex exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
rpcxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
rpcxpcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cxplt3d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A < 1 ) $.
cxplt3d.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
cxplt3d $p |- ( ph -> ( B < C <-> ( A ^c C ) < ( A ^c B ) ) ) $.
